Comments_List: I learned SQL language, design and evaluation of database, theory regarding database design like relational algebra.
Database systems. How to design and use one in an efficient way.
Database design, SQL.
How to build a database from scratch. Also learn about some database concepts
database
Knowledge of database systems structure, function . Theory of databases, building from ground up, conceptual, comprehensive class.
By taking this course, I learned basic knowledge on database systems and SQL

The announcements on Canvas made very little sense, there were no clear guidelines for assignments and the project, the website was constantly out of date and missing information and lectures, homeworks and exams had absolutely no feedback (why points were removed), the homework had bad deadlines set, the exams were unfairly written and there was too much focus on subject material that doesn't practically matter.
The professor has deep understanding of database system. The weakness would be it's a huge class but with too few TAs.

I think the materials are quite interesting and Avi does try to make the lectures engaging. The class has low lecture attendance but I think this is mostly due to the fact that you can study for exams from the detailed slides that Avi prepared. Whenever I come to lecture, though, I do learn more than what the slides say.
I think in general it's perfect
overall good
Strengths include detailed knowledge on database system, weakness is this class is lack of hands on directions on SQL.
NO.
Yes

I'd recommend this course. I know it's commonly known to be easier than other CS electives but that doesn't mean you don't learn anything from the course. I have a better understanding of not only how DB works but also how the OS works. I'd prefer having more dedicated TA's, though.
Yes.
I will. This course provide enough knowledge in database area. Based on my interview experiences, the knowledge I learned can handle almost all the questions.
nice intro to database
I am willing to recommend this class to another students since database system is pretty important now in now matter for business firms of tech firms.
